name: MonkeySpell
description:
The video game project is all about a fun and entertaining way to help students familiarize themselves with the spelling as well as the meaning of common and easy English words. It is envisioned to be an educational game suitable for elementary school students who have trouble with spelling common English words and to help them improve in this domain.

Year and Term of Capstone:  Capstone1, Term 3 , AY 2020-2021, De La Salle-College of Saint Benilde

The project was also nominated as an entry to 2021 GameOn. 

5GUYS1GAME:

Lead Designer and UI Artist: Timothy John Ureta

Lead Programmer: Howe Andre Luke Yap

Programmer and VFX Artist:  Coby Arriola 

Character and Background Artist: Rafael John Deleste

Animator and Sound Designer: Renzo Teves
